hi Deb,
 
Just tell the salesman you have the 12- 469 and =
he will show you various
speakers that will work with it.
FYI the speaker p=
lug needs to be 3.5mm but you don't need to tell the
man that but just chec=
k to make sure it fits your radio.
 
It is almost impossible for them to ma=
ke a mistake.
 
bruce
